sentences.en: As an asthmatic, he cannot cope with the heat and humidity.
sentences.cn: 他患有哮喘病，经不起高温和潮湿。

sentences.en: Depression lowers the human ability to cope with disease.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症会降低人体对疾病的抵抗力。

sentences.en: Doctors are having to cope with an everexpanding workload.
sentences.cn: 医生不得不应付日益增加的工作量.

sentences.en: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.cn: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

sentences.en: He found he could no longer cope with his demanding job.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己已无力应对那份劳神费力的工作了。

sentences.en: He was thick-skinned enough to cope with her taunts.
Hospitals said they could not cope with the wounded.
sentences.cn: 医院表示无力收治这么多伤者。

sentences.en: It takes a very buoyant personality to cope with constant rejection.
sentences.cn: 接受一再遭拒的结果需要非常乐天的性格.

sentences.en: seasonal workers brought in to cope with the Christmas period
sentences.cn: 为应付圣诞节期间的业务而招聘的临时工

sentences.en: Single parents cope heroically in doing the job of two people.
sentences.cn: 单身父母扮演双亲的角色非常辛苦。

sentences.en: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
sentences.cn: 卡琳设法达到了其职业的要求。

sentences.en: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.cn: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.en: The ferries can cope with the traffic of both goods and passengers.
sentences.cn: 货运与客运渡船都可应付。

sentences.en: The king convoke parliament to cope with the impending danger.
sentences.cn: 国王召开国会以应付迫近眉睫的危险.

sentences.en: The problems were an annoyance, but we managed to cope.
sentences.cn: 这些问题很讨厌，但是我们都设法解决了。

sentences.en: We have taken on extra staff to cope with the increased workload.
sentences.cn: 我们已经额外雇用员工来应付增加了的工作量。

sentences.en: When the children misbehaved she was unable to cope.
sentences.cn: 孩子们调皮捣蛋的时候她管不了。
